Preston Eugene Jackson bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ na ónyé nkụzi nke mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe osise ọha na eze na mpaghara Central Illinois. Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ígwè, ma ígwè na ígwè a kpụrụ akpụ, yana ágbá. Ihe osise ya na ihe ọkpụkpụ ya na-ekpuchi ọtụtụ ụdị, site na ihe na-enweghị atụ ruo "ihe dị adị nke na-emetụ n'ahụ". N'afọ 1998, a kpọrọ ya Laureate nkè Lincoln Academy of Illinois ma nata Order of Lincoln Medallion O nwèrè The Raven Gallery, ébé óbíbí nke Contemporary Art Center na Peoria, Illinois.

Ihe ngosi ihe osise ya na-agagharị agagharị "Fresh from Julieanneńs Garden" gosipụtara ihe karịrị otu narị nchara pụrụ iche nke ndị na-acha uhie uhie na-akọ akụkọ banyéré ndụ ha site na narị afọ nke irí nà asaá rụọ irí abụọ. Jackson natara Regional Emmy màkà ịnabata "Legacy in Bronze" ihe ngosi telivishọn nke gosipụtara ihe ndị a. N'afọ 2018, a họpụtara ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe Illinois kachasị mma n'oge niile dịka akụkụ nke ọrụ Illinois Top 200.
Jackson malitere ọrụ ya dị ka prọfesọ nke nka na Mahadum Western Illinois site na 1972 ruo 1989
O mechara kwaga na Art Institute nke Chicago na 1989 dị ka prọfesọ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ónyé isi oche nke Ngalaba Ihe Ọkpụkpụ site na 1994 ruo 1996 ma bụrụ ugbu a prọfesọ emeritus.
Jackson nwetara BFA ya na Mahadum Southern Illinois na nzèrè MFA ya na Jami'ar Illinois na 1972.
A mụrụ Jackson na úbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Machị, 1944 na Decatur, Illinois
Nwa Shirley na TJ Jackson, ọ tolitere otu n'ime ụmụ iri na Decatur Illinois. Ya na nwunye ya Melba nwèrè ụmụ nwanyị abụọ.
